DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy and safety is compared between interferon alfacon-1 alone and concomitant dosing of interferon alfacon-1 and ribavirin in hepatitis C patients.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison in Efficacy and Safety Between Interferon Alfacon-1 Alone and Concomitant Dosing With Ribavirin for the Treatment of Hepatitis C
DOC.criteria: Hepatitis C patients (high titer, genotype1) Patients with autoimmune disorder Patients with negative HBs antigen Patients with hepatic cirrhosis, hepatic failure and hepatic cancer Patients with depression or psychoneurotic disorder
